entry.title: BIP for Legacy Sign Verify functions
entry.summary: The discussion on bitcoin-dev mailing list revolves around the use of signatures and public keys in Bitcoin transactions. Luke Dashjr explains how signature + message is used to perform key recovery and extract the public key of the signer, which is then hashed and compared to the address provided. Aymeric Vitte questions the role of pubkey in sigscript for standard p2pkh transactions. Aymeric Vitte has also shared links related to simplifying Bitcoin transactions, Zcash wallets, and Bitcoin wallets on GitHub. Additionally, torrent dynamic blocklists, anti-spies and private torrents, and peersm are some of the other links shared by Aymeric Vitte.
